name: PATHWAY_STATUS
description: This table displays the status of the pathway (active, completed, or discontinued).

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the treatment plans record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This is the pathway status which can be Active, Completed or Discontinued.

columns.name: UPDATE_BY_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who updated the pathway status.

columns.name: UPDATE_BY_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: UPDATE_AT_DATETIME
columns.description: Stores the date and time when the pathway status was updated.
